More John Lucas NBA Stats »

NBA Transactions

Jun 8, 1976 - The Houston Rockets selected John Lucas in Round 1 with Pick 1 in the 1976 NBA Draft. Sep 1, 1976 - John Lucas signed a multi-year contract with the Houston Rockets. Sep 5, 1978 - John Lucas was acquired by the Golden State Warriors from the Houston Rockets in a trade. Jun 30, 1981 - The Golden State Warriors tendered a Qualifying Offer to make John Lucas a Restricted FA. Jul 1, 1981 - John Lucas, previously with the Golden State Warriors, became a free agent. Oct 15, 1981 - John Lucas signed a multi-year offer sheet with the Utah Jazz. Since he is a restricted free agent, the Golden State Warriors can match. Oct 18, 1981 - The Golden State Warriors matched the offer sheet that John Lucas signed with the Utah Jazz. Oct 19, 1981 - John Lucas signed a multi-year contract with the Golden State Warriors. Oct 20, 1981 - John Lucas was acquired by the Washington Bullets from the Golden State Warriors in a trade. Jan 25, 1983 - The Washington Bullets placed the contract of John Lucas on waivers. Jan 27, 1983 - John Lucas, previously with the Washington Bullets, became a free agent. Aug 29, 1983 - John Lucas signed a contract with the Cleveland Cavaliers. Sep 21, 1983 - The Cleveland Cavaliers placed the contract of John Lucas on waivers. Sep 23, 1983 - John Lucas, previously with the Cleveland Cavaliers, became a free agent. Dec 4, 1983 - John Lucas signed a contract with the San Antonio Spurs. Jun 30, 1984 - The San Antonio Spurs tendered a Qualifying Offer to make John Lucas a Restricted FA. Jul 1, 1984 - John Lucas, previously with the San Antonio Spurs, became a free agent. Sep 12, 1984 - John Lucas signed a multi-year offer sheet with the Houston Rockets. Since he is a restricted free agent, the San Antonio Spurs can match. Sep 13, 1984 - The San Antonio Spurs matched the offer sheet that John Lucas signed with the Houston Rockets. Sep 13, 1984 - John Lucas signed a multi-year contract with the San Antonio Spurs. Oct 4, 1984 - John Lucas was acquired by the Houston Rockets from the San Antonio Spurs in a trade. Dec 10, 1984 - The Houston Rockets placed the contract of John Lucas on waivers. Dec 12, 1984 - John Lucas, previously with the Houston Rockets, became a free agent. Feb 19, 1985 - John Lucas signed a multi-year contract with the Houston Rockets. Mar 14, 1986 - The Houston Rockets placed the contract of John Lucas on waivers. Mar 18, 1986 - John Lucas, previously with the Houston Rockets, became a free agent. Jan 17, 1987 - John Lucas signed a contract with the Milwaukee Bucks. Jul 1, 1987 - John Lucas, previously with the Milwaukee Bucks, became a free agent. Nov 1, 1987 - John Lucas signed a contract with the Milwaukee Bucks. Jul 1, 1988 - John Lucas, previously with the Milwaukee Bucks, became a free agent. Sep 19, 1988 - John Lucas signed a contract with the Seattle SuperSonics. Jul 1, 1989 - John Lucas, previously with the Seattle SuperSonics, became a free agent. Oct 5, 1990 - John Lucas retired from professional basketball.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the age of John Lucas?

John Lucas is 70 years old.

What is the height of John Lucas?

John Lucas is 6-3 (191cm) tall.

What is the weight of John Lucas?

John Lucas is 175 lbs (79kg).

What is the birthday of John Lucas?

John Lucas was born on Oct 31, 1953.

What position does John Lucas play?

John Lucas plays the G position.

What was the pre-draft team of John Lucas?

John Lucas was drafted out of Maryland.

What high school did John Lucas attend?

John Lucas attended Hillside High School in Durham, North Carolina.

What nationality is John Lucas?

John Lucas has a United States nationality.

Where was John Lucas born?

John Lucas was born in Durham, North Carolina.

How many NBA seasons has John Lucas played?

John Lucas played 14 seasons in the NBA.

What are the career averages of John Lucas?

John Lucas had career averages 10.7 points, 2.3 rebounds, 7.0 assists, 1.4 steals in 928 games.

What are the career totals of John Lucas?

John Lucas had career totals of 9,951 points, 2,151 rebounds, 6,454 assists, 73 blocks, 1,273 steals in 928 games.

How many teams has John Lucas been on?

John Lucas played for 6 NBA teams in his career - Golden State Warriors, Houston Rockets, Milwaukee Bucks, San Antonio Spurs, Seattle SuperSonics, Washington Wizards.

When was John Lucas drafted?

John Lucas was drafted in the 1st round (#2 overall) of the 1976 NBA Draft by the Houston Rockets.

What is John Lucas' career high in points?

John Lucas averaged a career high 17.5 points per game in 1986-1987.

What is John Lucas' career high in rebounds?

John Lucas averaged a career high 3.1 rebounds per game in 1977-1978.

What is John Lucas' career high in assists?

John Lucas averaged a career high 10.7 assists per game in 1983-1984.

What is the career PER of John Lucas'?

John Lucas had a career PER of 15.9.
